generateEstimate.query: mutation GenerateCostEstimate($input: DetailedCostEstimateInput!) { generateCostEstimate(input: $input) { success message status customerEstimate { estimateId breakdown { total parts { total } labor { total } tax } } } }

shareWithMechanic.query: mutation ShareEstimateWithMechanic($estimateId: String!, $customerComment: String!, $shopId: String!) { shareEstimateWithMechanic(estimateId: $estimateId, customerComment: $customerComment, shopId: $shopId) { id status sharedEstimateId customerComment } }

variables.customerComment: Please review - urgent brake repair needed

updateModifiedEstimate.query: mutation UpdateModifiedEstimate($requestId: String!, $modifiedEstimate: String!, $mechanicNotes: String!, $mechanicId: String!) { updateModifiedEstimate(requestId: $requestId, modifiedEstimate: $modifiedEstimate, mechanicNotes: $mechanicNotes, mechanicId: $mechanicId) { id status modifiedEstimate { breakdown { total parts { total } labor { total } tax } } mechanicNotes modifiedAt } }

variables.mechanicNotes: Found additional wear on rotors, adjusted estimate accordingly. Used premium parts for better longevity.

approveModifiedEstimate.query: mutation ApproveModifiedEstimate($estimateId: String!, $customerNotes: String) { approveModifiedEstimate(estimateId: $estimateId, customerNotes: $customerNotes) { id status customerApprovalNotes approvedAt } }

variables.customerNotes: Looks good, please proceed with the repair

rejectModifiedEstimate.query: mutation RejectModifiedEstimate($estimateId: String!, $customerNotes: String!) { rejectModifiedEstimate(estimateId: $estimateId, customerNotes: $customerNotes) { id status customerRejectionNotes rejectedAt } }

variables.customerNotes: Cost is too high, please find cheaper alternatives
